faq.question: Do I need my own keyboard?
faq.answer: Yes, a 61 or 88-key digital piano/keyboard is recommended for practice.

faq.question: Is this only for beginners?
faq.answer: No, even exam-trained students (Grade 4–6) join us for a new, practical perspective.

faq.question: What if I miss a class?
faq.answer: Every class is recorded in HD and available to watch later.

faq.question: What age group is this for?
faq.answer: We have students from ages 7 to 75+ successfully learning with us.
